alert.note: Alert for Western Highland (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued January 26 at 1:21PM EST until January 27 at 8:00AM EST by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO 8 AM EST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Very cold wind chills. Wind chills as low as 15 below zero. * WHERE...In Virginia, Western Highland County. In West Virginia, Western Grant and Western Pendleton Counties. * WHEN...From 6 PM this evening to 8 AM EST Thursday. * IMPACTS...The cold wind chills could result in hypothermia if precautions are not taken.
info.instruction: Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves.
